You can specify a version by: Date/time (D10/20/2005), Changeset version (C1256), Label (Lmylabel), Latest version (T), Workspace version (Workspacename;owner). If no version is provided, Team Foundation Server retrieves the latest server version of the specified itemspec into your workspace.
